Lucy Mooney (ihe dị ka 1880 na 1969) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na Gee's Bend quilting collective ma rụọ ọrụ màkà Freedom Quilting Bee. N'agbanyeghị na ọ tụfuru aka tupu ọ malite ịrụ ọrụ na Bee, ọ bụ ónyé na-emepụta akwa
Pete Seeger nwere otu n'ime uwe elu ya. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston na Frist Art Museum.
Mooney na di ya Needom rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ Sandy Hill, nke bụbu ubi Van de Graaff na Gee's Bend
Travis bụ ónyé wéré ha n'ọrụ n'oge ahụ.
